messages.content: What is lazy-pony-prompter?
Lazy-pony-prompter is an extension for ComfyUI that provides a tag filtering system, prompt management, and custom prompt templates.
What was added in the 1.0.0 release of lazy-pony-prompter?

The 1.0.0 release of lazy-pony-prompter overhauled the UI, added a new tag filtering system with filter management and pattern substitutions, filter prompts by content rating, increased the maximum prompts limit to 1500, and improved status reporting and logging.
When was custom prompt templates support added to lazy-pony-prompter?
Custom prompt templates support was added to lazy-pony-prompter on 2024-01-17.
When did lazy-pony-prompter start storing prompts cache in binary?
Lazy-pony-prompter started storing prompts cache in binary on 2023-10-23, which reduced size and load time.
When was experimental ComfyUI support added to lazy-pony-prompter?
Experimental ComfyUI support was added to lazy-pony-prompter on 2023-10-23.
When was the legacy cache format updater removed from lazy-pony-prompter?
The legacy cache format updater was removed from lazy-pony-prompter on 2023-10-19.
What sources and formats does lazy-pony-prompter support as of 2023-10-01?
As of 2023-10-01, lazy-pony-prompter supports e621.net as a tag source, basic support for EasyFluff model, and standard A1111 styles feature for prompt formatting.
What is Lazy Pony Prompter?
Lazy Pony Prompter is a booru API powered prompt generator for AUTOMATIC1111's Stable Diffusion Web UI and ComfyUI. It has a flexible tag filtering system and customizable prompt templates.
Which boorus/websites are supported by Lazy Pony Prompter?
Lazy Pony Prompter currently supports Derpibooru and E621 boorus/websites, with plans to add more in the future.
What are some key features of Lazy Pony Prompter?

Some key features include an overhauled UI, a new tag filtering system with filter management and pattern substitutions, filtering prompts by content rating, increased maximum prompts fetching limit to 1500, and improved status reporting and logging.
How does Lazy Pony Prompter operate?
Lazy Pony Prompter operates by making a prompt list from a search query to one of the supported booru sites and then generating images using that list.
What can you do in the Prompts Manager tab of Lazy Pony Prompter?

In the Prompts Manager tab, you can select existing prompt collections, save currently loaded ones, load selected collections, and delete selected collections. You can also select model-specific prompt formatting and indicate whether the Filters input should automatically be populated when loading a prompt collection.
How can you customize prompts using Lazy Pony Prompter?
You can customize prompts by placing special tokens into the standard A1111 prompt textbox. Lazy Pony Prompter groups tags into certain categories which can then be referenced through tokens.
What are some recommended models for use with Lazy Pony Prompter?

The officially supported models for Lazy Pony Prompter are Pony Diffusion V6 XL, EasyFluff, and Pony Diffusion V5(.5), but it should work well for other tag-based models as long as their 'native' booru is used as the tag source.
